thread.title: BARSTOW: Man found dead in burning house committed suicide
thread.title_full: BARSTOW: Man found dead in burning house committed suicide - Press Enterprise

author: RICHARD BROOKS
title: BARSTOW: Man found dead in burning house committed suicide
text:
BY RICHARD BROOKS / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 12, 2015 Updated: 8:53 p.m. BARSTOW: Man found dead in burning house committed suicide Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Related article Â» A man found dead inside a blazing Barstow house was a 58-year-old resident who'd apparently committed suicide, say San Bernardino County coroner's officials.
Bradley Mastin's body was found at 2:39 p.m. Thursday, Oct. 8, at the fire scene along the 28000 block of Church Avenue.
Mastin had suffered a self-inflicted gunshot wound, investigators determined. Before the fire, a stove had been turned on, allowing the escape of natural gas that apparently was ignited by a bug bomb.
